title: Gargantuan Cleave
content:
Str Save OR you fall prone.

Gargantuan Cleave is an Action in Baldur's Gate 3. Actions can be used in both exploration and combat to maneuver across the battlefield or to harm or aid Characters. The actions that a Character can perform are based on their Class an Equipment.

Gargantuan Cleave Information

Gargantuan Cleave deals Weapon damage + mod + 1d6 (extra) to any number of targets, BUT gives you a debuff for 1 turn :"Off Balance", in which for every hit taken you must succeed a DC 8 Str
